property.name: fs.s3a.endpoint
property.description: AWS S3 endpoint to connect to. An up-to-date list is provided in the AWS Documentation: regions and endpoints. Without this property, the standard region (s3.amazonaws.com) is assumed.

property.name: fs.s3a.path.style.access
property.description: Enable S3 path style access ie disabling the default virtual hosting behaviour. Useful for S3A-compliant storage providers as it removes the need to set up DNS for virtual hosting.

property.name: fs.s3a.impl
property.description: The implementation class of the S3A Filesystem
